author: Simon Difford
description: A fruity concoction to remember should you find yourself with a bottle of crème de myrtille.
name: Myrtle Martini
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
